metadata.title: CVE-2012-3541 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason:This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed thatit was not a security issue. Notes: none.

criterions.comment: rpcbind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nfs-utils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
